space.world

Class TurretStrategyImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.world.TurretStrategyImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TurretStrategy

    public class TurretStrategyImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements TurretStrategy
    Represents a strategy used by turrets. This strategy looks for a player in the room. It adjusts where it is facing so that it can fire bullets at the closest player in the room
    Author:
    Maria Libunao

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(int delta)
        Updates the turret. This is done by looking for the closest player in the room & if there is one, adjust where the turret is facing and shoot at the player
        Specified by:
        update in interface TurretStrategy
        Parameters:
        delta - the amount of time since the last update
